title: VVork for chimny-sweepers: or A warning for tabacconists Describing the pernicious vse of tabacco, no lesse pleasant then profitable for all sorts to reade.
author: Philaretes, fl. 1602.
publisher: By T. Este [and Thomas Creede], for Thomas Bushell, & are to be sould at the great north dore of Powles,
notes: The introductory verse signed: I.H., i.e. John Hind?.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Running title reads: A warning for tabacconists.
The preliminaries and most of the last twelve pages are reimposed from STC 12571.5, which came first.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
